summary: When Daphne becomes the star of a vampire film, the production is thrown into chaos by a real vampire, forcing the Scooby-Doo team to investigate who's behind this monstrous mayhem.
cast: Frank Welker|Matthew Lillard|Grey Griffin|Mindy Cohn|Christian Campbell|Rob Paulsen|Jeff Bennett|Jim Cummings|Jim Wise|Mindy Sterling|Obba Babatundé|Julianne Buescher|Robert Townsend
title: ¡Scooby-Doo! La canción del vampiro
